profile.likes: Smart people, fast results, clean documents

background.story: A genius scholar from the Tower of Sage who remembers everything she sees. After developing her own theories and systems of Rune Magic, she quickly grew bored and moved onto a different subject. Soon, she was appointed as the highest ranking royal secretary of finance. Unfortunately, many politicians refused to accept a commoner as their superior. After many lies and ill rumors, Veronica eventually decided to leave the palace on her own. But this was hardly a defeat for her, and she soon set out to conquer a new path. She headed to the Orvel Guild Alliance, where she would be measured only by her abilities and nothing else. As expected, her incredible perception and analytical skills made her an indispensable asset to numerous guilds.

itemIntroductions.weapon: Her approval is needed to process any important items in the Guild Alliance. An office item cherished by the founder of the Guild Alliance. A feather pen and folder put together in a set. The pen has a mana ball embedded in it so it requires mana instead of ink, and it must be used on a magic parchment that cannot be written on with a regular pen. The letters that are written by the writer cannot be erased without the writer's mana. Also, text can be written on the magic parchment without any limit, and it has a function to search for stuff one has written before. It makes Veronica's work that much more effective. Of course, it's useful when it's used for work, but outside of work...
itemIntroductions.soul:
Accordio is Veronica's office tool which is also a top-classed magic item, but Veronica wanted it to be able to do something more. Thus, Veronica started the experiment on Accordio to enhance its capabilities, so that it can have stronger abilities. Although she had strayed away from magic and academia since leaving the Tower of Sage, her innate ingenuity allowed Veronica to smoothly proceed with the research.
At last, when Veronica's research reached its climax, Accordio finally awakened as a being with its own shape and ego, as if it was impressed by Veronica's persistence and her challenging spirit.
treasures: A manual that provides behavioral guidelines for the members of the guild. It is more than 3 times as thick as an ordinary book, and it's proof of Veronica's meticulous nature. It would take a long time for any reader to cover with all of its content.

Pen point that Veronica always carries around. She had soaked it in the Spring of Promise for 100 days, just like Blacksmith Jin had advised. With the power of magic, the letters written by this pen turn red when the actions are not carried out accordingly. Veronica says it's very helpful when managing supplies.

A seal given to the best guild manager of Orvel. All guild affairs can't be processed without this seal. The meticulous Veronica doesn't stamp a document unless it's perfect. An item that shows Veronica's professional spirit.

A compilation of guild account reports that Veronica makes every month and every year. No one can process these documents as perfectly as she does. Those who saw the height of documents piled up would immediately walk out of the room every single time. These piled documents are the evidence that shows why Veronica is the Top Financier.
